column4: ya? i havent found much that makes me want to go away from debian, you say you favor ubuntu over debian?
well ubuntu is a easy install and configures stuff for you. It's better for newbies because they could spend like 20 hours or more tying to configure debian to work
yar, my first debian install were kind of hairy, but not too many problems, so ubuntu is based off of debian and is more newbie-ish / desktop-user orientated?
yep it's great for desktop users! It owns! But i'm sure debian owns in othe areas like server mode
